channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK feels the heat as investors and critics question its future
item.description: A spike in long-term borrowing costs, concerns over the forthcoming Autumn Budget and political instability — it's just another normal week for the U....

item.title: Pulte refuses to say where he got Lisa Cook mortgage fraud ‘tip’
item.description: President Donald Trump's housing finance chief Bill Pulte has accused Cook of claiming multiple properties as her primary residence.

item.title: U.S. economy generated just 54,000 new private-sector jobs last month: ADP
Judge voids $2.2 billion Harvard funding freeze by Trump administration
item.description: The Trump administration in April froze grants to Harvard University over concerns about antisemitism on the Ivy League campus and other concerns.
